thread.title: A7X: How We Ended Up Drunk Onstage In Hard Rock Cafe Helsinki [News]
thread.title_full: A7X: How We Ended Up Drunk Onstage In Hard Rock Cafe Helsinki [News]

title: A7X: How We Ended Up Drunk Onstage In Hard Rock Cafe Helsinki [News]
text:
Posted 6 hours ago 11 
Synyster Gates was asked by Radio Rock about A7X's recent drunken impromptu performance of " Nightmare " at Hard Rock Cafe Helsinki, to which he replied (transcribed by UG): 
"Basically, we couldn't find any place open to eat, 'cause nothing's open on Sunday. [Chuckles] 
"So we went to the Hard Rock, there was nobody in there, they had this small little stage, and we just kept drinking and drinking until we decided it was a good idea to get up onstage and play one of our fuckin' songs. [Chuckles] 
"Apparently, they thought we were just gonna go up there, turn it way down and not be annoying at all. But we were very annoying apparently, to all 6 people in there. 
"There weren't many people there at all, but they just looked in horror, complained, and then we got shut down... DURING MY SOLO!" 
The guitarist added: "We thought it would be ironic to be at the Hard Rock and not get recognized and actually get kicked off stage - we thought that would be pretty funny. And it happened!" 
In case you missed it, you can check out the footage below.
